thread.title: BlackRock Announces Share Split for Four iShares ETFs

author: cnbc.com
title: BlackRock Announces Share Split for Four iShares ETFs
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- BlackRock (NYSE: BLK) announces that the iShares Board of Trustees and Board of Directors have authorized a share split for iShares Global 100 ETF (IOO), iShares Global Healthcare ETF (IXJ), iShares Global Consumer Staples ETF (KXI) and iShares MSCI EM ESG Optimized ETF (ESGE).
The Boards have approved a 2-for-1 split for these funds for shareholders of record as of the close of business on April 27, 2018, payable after the close of trading on May 1, 2018. The 2-for-1 split will lower the share price and increase the number of outstanding shares. The total value of shares outstanding is not affected by the split.
